Posts.Content: My heart is broken, my Beautiful angel died yesterday in my arms. She was my costant companion, never did she leave me, when I was sick and fighting for my life. Bear and Angel were boyfriend and girlfriend, he is missing her also. I'm not sure what I'm going too do without her. Angel is the one in the picture Bear is on my expression page. My eyes are about swollen shut from crying for her. I dont know what to do. Karie
Posts.Title: My Beautiful Angel died

Posts.Content: My heart is broken, my Beautiful angel died yesterday in my arms. She was my costant companion, never did she leave me, when I was sick and fighting for my life. Bear and Angel were boyfriend and girlfriend, he is missing her also. I'm not sure what I'm going too do without her. Angel is the one in the picture Bear is on my expression page. Posts.Title: My Beautiful Angel died

Posts.Content: Meena, I think of you all the time and pray that if I get a reacurance, that I can be as strong as you. You are so loved and admired, please keep your chin up sister. God Bless Elizabeth what a soldier. Love you Meena. Karie
Posts.Title: RIP Elizabeth Edwards

Posts.Content: Your the Best and a special Thank You for taking over for Chens task. Have a Blessed Day. Your Friend and Sis Karie
Posts.Title: Thank you Jean..

Posts.Content: It does but now you are finished with that part of treatment, and your body will slowly start to feeling better, it took me awhile but eventually I started to feel like my old self again, but I know this is the new me. Please take it slow and easy dear sister and rest as much as you can. Good luck with your surgery, and I hope it goes much better for you than Chemo. Hugs Karie

Posts.Content: Same here Heidi! February 2 will be two years sense dx. Keep your head up! Karie

Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: I had long hair, mid back, and I decided to get a shorter hair cut so I could try to get used to it. Tan it started to fall out...clogged the tub and then that was it my scalp hurt so bad I could'nt take it so my Honey Troy shaved it off. Could never get used to a wig so hats and scarfes and now I will be going for my second haircut next week. Hugs Karie
Posts.Title: need advice on hair loss preparation

Posts.Content: Dito on all of the above. Hugs Karie
Posts.Title: I have to escape for a while

Posts.Content: MJ How long before you had a recurrnce, and Please let us know what your options are. Take Care Karie
Posts.Title: reoccurance question

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear of your loss, wishing you and your family PEACE. God Bless...Karie
Posts.Title: MIL Passed Away

Posts.Content: My heart goes out too you. I just lost my beautiful angel three weeks ago, and we are still feeling the loss as well as her boyfriend Bear. Bear is not doing well at all, we have even had to take him to the vet because he wont eat or drink. My prayers and thoughts are with you and your family. Lots of hugs Karie

Posts.Content: Wonderful news, I'm doing the Happy Dance with you. Karie

Posts.Content: Thinking of you, and you made me think of how I reacted. I was very nervouse and I know my nurse could sense it, so my doc did give me something to calm me down. Let us know how it goes. Karie
